snippet: A day after Dallas linebacker Jerry Brown died in a car crash, which prompted the arrest of a teammate, the Cowboys overcame a 9-point deficit in the closing minutes against Cincinnati.
abstract: Dallas Cowboys earn 20-19 victory against Cincinnati Bengals, as Cowboys deal with death of one teammate and tribulations of another.
lead_paragraph: A day after Dallas linebacker Jerry Brown died in a car crash, which prompted the arrest of a teammate, the Cowboys overcame a 9-point deficit in the closing minutes against Cincinnati.

headline.seo: Grieving for Teammate, Cowboys Rally to Win
headline.main: Cowboys Rally on a Day of Tears
headline.print_headline: Cowboys Rally on a Day of Tears
